short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for common tools for web developers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Common tools for web development. Click on extension icon to open tools.

Available Tools:
- JSON formatter
- JavaScript REPL
- Text diff
- Markdown preview
- Lorem ipsum generator
- HTML/CSS playground

Features
- Completely offline
- Open source
- Built using svelte and TypeScript
- Uses VSCode's Monaco editor

Source code: https://github.com/noobtiger/dev-utils-addon
